Richard Freshwater, of estate agency Cheffins, said the lack of stock was the biggest he had seen in 20 years.

articles.author: Will Pavia, New York
articles.title: Children and pets at risk from Peloton running machines, owners told - The Times
articles.description: Parents and pet owners have been warned to stop using Peloton running machines after US regulators said they posed a “serious risk” in homes.The “urgent warning” about the Peloton’s Tread+ exercise
articles.content:
Parents and pet owners have been warned to stop using Peloton running machines after US regulators said they posed a serious risk in homes.
